skills.name: Calculate the whole amount, given a fraction of the amount
Know that probabilities must lie between 0, impossible, and 1, certain
Assign probabilities to single events using fractions
Calculate the probability of two independent events occurring without drawing a tree diagram
Calculate the probability of two dependent events occurring without drawing a tree diagram

explanations.A: Tom is correct. Any event with a probability of 0 is impossible. Katie is wrong, as a probability of one means that an event is certain to happen.
explanations.B: Not quite. Remember that probability lies between 0 and 1
